title: Principles of Communications 7th Edition c2015 Ziemer + Tranter
description:
Principles of Communications: Systems, Modulation, and Noise, 7th Edition (c2015), textbook by Roger E. Ziemer & William H. Tranter.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP002909

AUDIENCE: Undergrad seniors and beginning grad students, and practicing engineers in Electrical Engineering and (Tele)Communication Engineering.

BRIEF CONTENTS:
---------------
1. INTRODUCTION
2. SIGNAL AND LINEAR SYSTEM ANALYSIS
3. LINEAR MODULATION TECHNIQUES
4. ANGLE MODULATION AND MULTIPLEXING
5. PRINCIPLES OF BASEBAND DIGITAL DATA TRANSMISSION
6. OVERVIEW OF PROBABILITY AND RANDOM VARIABLES
7. RANDOM SIGNALS AND NOISE
8. NOISE IN MODULATION SYSTEMS
9. PRINCIPLES OF DATA TRANSMISSION IN NOISE
10. ADVANCED DATA COMMUNICATIONS TOPICS
11. OPTIMUM RECEIVERS AND SIGNAL SPACE CONCEPTS
12. INFORMATION THEORY AND CODING

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF. On-line material appended to text for convenience. Also included, MATLAB (.m) files used in chapter examples. All this foldered (Ziemer - Principles of Communications Systems Modulation and Noise 7th c2015)
